intro.description: This cheat sheet walks you through the creation of a Data Project in the 'Project Explorer'

item.title: DExplore perspective
item.description: Open the DExplore perspective, designed for browsing through the data

item.title: Create a New Data Project
item.description: Click below to start the new data project wizard. This creates a project capable of containing new data files and importing large data links. You can also start this wizard by right clicking and selecting 'New...'.
